'''''Amon Hen'' 297''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in October [[2022]].

==Contents==
*Front cover: Barad-dûr by [[Ralph Damiani]]
*'''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
*'''4''' - The Duel of Morgoth and Fingolfin by Caroline Flynn
*'''6''' - Ruined Castles and Vampiric Villians: The Liminal Gothic in Tolkien’s Tale of Beren and Lúthien by James Moffett
*'''16''' - Ungoliant by Danny Linton
*'''18''' - Luthien in the Court of Morgoth by Pete Amachree
*'''20''' - Forgotten Tales by Martin Iaquinta
*'''25''' - Review: Alan Lee’s “The Hobbit & The Lord of the Rings Sketchbook Deluxe Edition Boxed Set” by Cate Palmer-Billin
*'''26''' - Tolkien Society Goes Hybrid by Amanda Drak
*'''27''' - In Memory of Leslie Megahey by Stuart Lee
*'''28''' - Mathom
*'''31''' - Dating Tolkien #4 by Mick Henry
*'''32''' - News From Fangorn
*'''34''' - Behind Glass Doors
*Back cover: Hobbit Halloween by Wolfanita
